snippet: The nation's largest tobacco companies are challenging court-ordered advertisements requiring the cigarette makers to say they lied about the dangers of smoking....

headline.print_headline: Court-Ordered Anti-Smoking Ads Challenged by Firms
headline.main: Court-Ordered Anti-Smoking Ads Challenged by Firms

lead_paragraph: The nation's largest tobacco companies are challenging court-ordered advertisements requiring the cigarette makers to say they lied about the dangers of smoking.
